attributes.action: ensure everyone is aware of the 11CTC claim form for Children's Tax Credit.  The closing date for submission is 31 01 09 - please extend this date to 31 03 09 and give clarity to who is entitled to claim.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Newspapers have reported(end Jan 09)that claim forms should be returned to your local office, however no forms are now available and the downloaded 11CTC is missing several boxes. 
Even if you add your name address and NINO - have you put them in the right place? (these forms are read by machines) and do they need any other information?  
Please make available a complete and clear form with time to return it!

rejection.details: Your title should be a single, clear call for action.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
